GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article object with the given id

exampleResponse.title: Am I a cat?
exampleResponse.author: icellusedkars
exampleResponse.body: Having run out of ideas for articles, I am staring at the wall blankly, like a cat. Does this make me a cat?

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.desciption: serves an array of comments for the given article_id

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves a user object with the given id
